questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Nature and animal

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) Near a body of water

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A busy street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A building
C) An animal inside the waterbody with trees reflection
D) A person

B) An animal's head
C) A flower
D) A car

A) Mountains
B) Buildings
C) Trees and their reflections

B) A boat
C) Water with trees reflection
D) A bench

B) Fish
C) Reptile
D) Mammal

B) Just the head

D) The legs

B) Trees
C) Buildings
D) People

C) Frozen
